div.p:
Curia Capitalis balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
duodecimo die mensis Januarij Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quinto
Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent

Eodem die accedens ad barram dis honestus vir Andreas steuinsone
et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu xij solidorum sibi annuatim
debito de terra anteriore Alexandri crag Jacente in vico de le skulhill ex boreali
parte eiusdem inter terram Willelmum belty ex orientali ex vna Et terram
Willelmum moir ex occidentali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in
sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Alexandro
pottar Johanne Ray et ormundo lesly seriando

head.add: processus magistri Dauid menyes collector capellanum de Abirdene

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Dauid menyeis
collector capellanum collegij ecclesie parrochiali de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu vigintj solidorum vsualis monete
scocie dicti capellanus annuatim a longo tempore debito et non soluto de
quadam terra vasta quondam Alexander chamer Jacente in vico Inferiori ecclesie
ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram ipsium quondam alexander ex boreali
ex vna et terram quondam thome prat ex australi partibus ab altera
et communionem viam regiam versus oriens Ad quam terram accedens
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curiam tanquam secundo die huius
processus testibus Willelmo King alexandro rolland' et Johanne cuk
sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas collisone
capellanus altaris sancti stephani prothomartiris et protestabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo Redditu iiijor solidorum monete scocie sibi et dicto
altarj annuatim debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam
Willelmum tulideff Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem
inter terram Johannis collisone ex orientali et terram Johannis moir'
ex occidentali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
secundo die huius processus testibus Alexander rolland' Willelmo King et Johanne
cuk seriando

Eodem die magister Dauid menyeis capellanus altaris sancti Duthaci infra ecclesiam
sancti nicholaij de de abirdene situati protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum
de terra vasta quondam Willelmum tulideff in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram
Johannis collisone ex orientali et terram Johannis moir ex occidentali Ad quam accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit
in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Willelmo Kinge alexandro Rolland'
Rolland' et Johanne cuk seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Alexander Rauff capellanus
ac collector capellanorum collegij cathederalis Abirdonensis et protestabatur in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu trium solidorum vsualis monete scocie dictis
capellanis annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta
quondam thome gray carnificis ex occidentali patricij Jacente in le
Rattoun' Raw inter terram thome gray carnificis ex occidentali et terram
Alexandrj scherar' ex orientali et communionem viam regiam versus austrum Ad
quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Andrea stevinsone alexandro moresone et ormundo lesly sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Alexander bisset
capellanus perpetuus altaris sanctj sanguinis infra ecclesiam parrochiali
nicholaij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo redditu monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim
debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam
Jacente
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
die huius procesus

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas collisone capellanus
altaris sancti infra ecclesiam sancti nicholaij de Aberdene et protestabatur
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu vj s' et octo denariorum de terra Johannis thomson'
in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vicj inter terram Donaldi strathachin
ex occidentali et terram torrentem communionem viam regiam versus oriens
et communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die
huius processus testibus Willelmo King Alexandro rolland et ormundo lesly seriando

head.add: the graunt of the common' assedacioun to be maid' and chesin of the commissaris

div.p:
The said day be warnyng and' oppin premunicioun throue the baill toune
be the commoun hand bell the alderman bailyeis counsaill and communite perso
naly gatherit and circualy Inquerit be the sergeandis officiaris and be
the bailyes grantit ordane and' consentit to set ale thar commoun fischingis
watteris and landis of the said burgh' for the termes of fiwe yeris Imme
diatelie to be Runnyne eftir the wis' of this generall assedacioun' Instant
quhilk Induris to the wigill of sanctandrouis nixt and' Immediat heir
eftir following And chesit thir personis gilbert menyeis aldermane
Dauid menyeis his fadir Johnne leslie of warderis sere Johnne Ruthir
furnd' knicht Johnne of cullane Alexander Reid and' James colisoun'
thaf commissouris to set thar said watteris fischingis and landis with
thar pertinens to burges and Induellaris of the said' burgh' for the
commoun' weill and' proffit of the said burgh' Induring the said'
termes quhilkis deponit the gret atht' to set the samyne eftir
thar knavleg conscience and' vnderstandin for the vtilite commoun'
proffit' of the toune' And' atour thai ordanit ane sufficient com
missioun' to be maid' to the said' sevin personis tharupoun' and'
selit witht thar commone Seill et cetera

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Dauid menyheis
capellanus altaris Sancti Elegij situati infra ecclesiam parrochialem
Sancti nicholaij de Abirdene Et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo
redditu sibi et dicto altarj annuatim a longo tempore
debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam gilberti Riburne
Jacente in vico Nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem inter terram thome
chamer ex orientali et terram quondam Andree lammyntone ex boreali
et terram Johannis chamer ex australi et communionem viam Regiam
ex occidentali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in
Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Willelmo King
Alexandro Rolland' et Johanne Cuk sergeando

add.foreign: dominus Alexander chamer et minister sancte trinitatis

div.p:
The said day frer Johne arnot minister of the trinite hous' of Abirdene
grantit and oblist him fathtfullie to content and pay to sere Androw
chamer chaplane perpertuale of Sanct cristiforis altar of Abirdene fyve schillingis
Scottis money within xxtj dais next hereftir for his annuell Rent avcht
to him of ane land' pertening to vmquhile Androw lammynton' liand' befor
the said' trinite place and to big and mak the said' land' strenyeabile be the
fest of witsonday next to cum for the said' annuell Rent to the pament
of the said' sere Androw and has Successoris yerlie and termlie

head.add: Judicium processus ministrj domus sancte trinitatis

div.p:
Eodem die Accedens ad barram et cetera tribus processibus per Religiosum virum ministrum domus Sancte trinitatis perlectis deductis de et super re
cuperacione proprietatis et possessionis eiusdem terre penitus vaste quondam Andree lammynton'
Jacente in vico nauium ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam dominum thome heruy
ex orientali ex vna et communiones vias regias ex occidentali et australi partibus ab altera
in defectu solucionis vnius annuij redditus quinque solidorum sibi et dicte domuj a longo tempore debito
et non soluto Vnde dictus minister peciit a balliuos sibi fieri de dicta terra Juris
et Justicie complementum secundum tenorem suj processus precedens Et consequenter dominus Dauid
liell prelocutorio nomine dicti minstrj porrexit plegium in manibus Willelmum scrimgeor seriandi
quod dictus minister proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre cum pertinenciis legitime recuperauit
In defectu solucionis dicti annuj Redditus vnde hora die legitime expextata omnibus
Interesse habentibus vocatis et nullo comparenti nec opponenti decretum fuit per Curiam et datum
fuit pro Judicio per os Alexandri Jofrasone Judicatoris Curie quod Ipse minister causam suam
obtinuit in Recuperacione dicte terre propertatis Cum suis pertinenciis sibi quibus dictus prelocutor peciit
Instrumentum Sigillis balliuorum et cetera Testibus Dauid menyes Johanne ruthirfurd' milite Alexandro Red'
Johanne leslie de warderis Willelmo portar patricio leslie Duncano colison' Alexandro ma
theson' Andre nachtj et Normanno leslie seriandis

Eodem die accedens ad barram Discretus vir dominus Johannes Reid capellanus altarum
sanctorum ninianj episcopi et laurencij martiris infra ecclesiam perrochialiem sancti nicholaij de Aberdene situati
et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu quinque s' sibi et dicto altarj
annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Dauid
galichtly Jacente in vico nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram quondam Willelmi Kymdy
constabilarij de Aberdene ex boreali et terram quondam Richardi craufurd ex occidentali et
communionem viam regiam versus austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo
die huius processus Testibus Willelmo King et alexandro rolland ac Andrea nachtj
seriando

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvjo die Ja
nuarij anno quo supra

The said' day the aldirman ballieis Counsale and communite grantit and gaf tile
ane worschipfule mane mastir Dauy menyeis thar perpetuale chaplanry of Sanct
peteris altar within thar parroche kirk of the said' burghe for ale the dais of his liwe
vacand and being at thar discposicioun' and gift be deces' of vmquhile mastir Androw
Crafurd last possessor of the Samyn and ordanit to Seile his donacioun and
gift with thar common Sele

The said' day mastir Dauy menyeis purely ande Simplie resignit the perpetuale
chaplanry of Sanct Duthois altar in the handis of gilbert menyeis aldirman
of the said' burghe be ane gluff in fauor of sere Dauy Waus his Cosing Ande
In continent thareftir the aldirman ballieis Counsale and Communite gaf the said' chaplanry
to the saide sere Dauy for ale the dais of his liwe Ande ordanit to Sele
his donacioun' and gift tharapone with thar common seile

The said' day mastir Dauy menyeis purlie and Simplie resignit in the handis
of gilbert menyeis aldirman of abirdene the tua markis of the malys of thar
landis of hessilhed' et cetera quhilkis tua markis the aldirman balyeis Counsale
and communite at request of thar louet familiar' sere Johne Stirueling gaf
to sere Dauy leill quhile he be promouit tile ane bettir lyving And' ordanit
thar common' seile to be gevin tharupon'

The said day the prouest balyeis counsale and diuers' of the communite being present fot the tyme
for the cessing of pley and vnite and concord to be hede continevit betuix the frendis and kynnismen
of gilbert menyeis aldirman one that ane part Ande Jonhne leslie of Warderis his frendis
and kynnismen one that vthir part grauntit and Consentit that mastir gavane leslie Cosin to the
saide Jonhne of leslie sale haue the first chaplanrie vacant being at thar dispo
sicioun' becaus' the frendis of the said' mastir Consentit to the gift of Sanct peteris
chaplanry to mastir Dauid menyeis et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo Nono die mensis Januarij
anno quo supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Robertus scrogis est filius ac legitimus et
propinquior heres quondam thome scrogis patris suj

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Alexander blinsele est filius ac legitimus
et propinquior heres quondam Willelmum blinsel patris suj

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die Januarij anno quo supra
anno quo supra

head.add: the millar' of the Justice myllis

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman ballieis and Counsale riplie auisit Sett and to maile leyt to
Williame makesoun' duelland' in Croudan' all and haill thar Justice myllis with thar
pertinence and with the fredomes Commoditeis asiamentis and profitis pertening tharto for ale the termes
of fyve yeris to him and his helpis nay gretar than he is / entirand' at witsonday
next hereftir tharto Ande to tak the profitis of the said' myllis quhile the said' witsonday
gif ony cane be gottin Ande atour' the said Williame sale deulie byg the saide myllis
one his expens' Ande thareftir Suorne personis vnsusupect salbe chosin and Suorne and
estime and pris' the samyn myllis And' the Costis that he happinnis to mak on' the bigyn'
of thame salbe allouit to him in his first yeris maile Atour thai asignit ale the cornez'
grovyn' apon' thar' landis of the gardin hessilhed' schethoyslie bogferlow the Crovys
Rubyslawe Ande the toulloche with thar pertinence to be groundit and pay thar' multuris
to thar said' myllis for the quhilkis the said' William sal pay yerlie tene merkis of
penny maile And' the saide fiwe yeris being runnyn the said' William sale haue the said' myllis
in tak befor ale vthiris doing tharfor as vthiris will do

head.add: Dauid Kintor Junior Dauid Kintor senior

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Dauid mar' for
spekar for Dauy Kintor yongar to preiwe the gudis of airschip contenit in ane bile producit
in Jugement quhilkis he clamit and askit at Dauy Kintor eldar pertening to the saide
Dauy as ayr tile his grantsir'

The said' day the aldirman and ballieis assignit friday the penult day of this Instant
monetht of Januar' to Johne or mar' forspekar for Androu gordon' and Agnes strathachin
his wyf one that ane part Ande to Duncan Colison forspekar for thomas buchane one
that vthir part to bring thar' richtis and prewis befor thame anent ane Ring and
ane maser clamyt be the said' thomas as airschip be deces' of vmquhile of William
buchane his brothir for ministracioun of Justice to be done anent the saide gudis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die Januarij anno quo
Supra

The said' day Dauy Kintor requerit Williame Watsone diuers' tymes tile admitt him
procurator for thome of Drumbrek to follou and defend' in ale thingis that he has to persew
him and he him and sald' ak him procurator for the said' thomas tile Ansuer to the
said' Williame in ale thingis and to do for him al that he suld' do and he war
present Ande atour the said' Dauy admittit ale actis maid' betuix the said' partiis
Obefor
